name: 2024 7th International Conference on Digital Medicine and Image Processing
content: Paper Publishing: 1\. International Conference Proceedings by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-0958-6), archived by ACM Digital Library, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by CPCI. 2\. Journal of Image and Graphics (JOIG, ISSN: 2301-3699), which will be included in Scopus, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, IndexCopernicus, etc.
